content.rendered:
ROSE GOLD BIRTHDAY CELEBRATION

TO AGELESS BEAUTY! 

2018 has been a BIG year for me so far and just a few weeks ago I turned 50! I decided to celebrate in a really big way and throw a fabulash rose gold birthday party. I think we should always be grateful and celebrate life every single day birthday or no birthday…but then other times just throw a huge party and just let loose with family and dear friends. Every moment and every second in life is really precious. Don’t dwell on your age just because you have a birthday with a zero coming up. At the end of your life, you might look back and realize how young you were and that you should have enjoyed every year that you were alive. So don’t wait……celebrate and be grateful!

MY LOOK

I wore a very classic, beautiful nude beaded gown that was picked out by @stylepr. It was absolutely gorgeous! I was of course rocking a pair of D’Lashes and had my makeup done by @terrelmullin. I had my hair done by @raym_thefireman and he even topped it off with a fun black crown.  

 

FOOD

I had a giant wall of donuts that was lit up with a neon sign! I had cake pops and a beautiful cake with rose gold leaf on it! We even had some yummy apple pie for all the guests to enjoy. The food was amazing! 

  

DECOR

I went with very classic colors of white, rose gold, and black. I had fun, yet chic balloons as decoration spelling out my name. The venue @mr.chotels had beautiful views, big chandeliers, and helped set the stage for my party. My tables had a runner of beautiful white flowers accented by candlelight and rose gold chargers. Flowers were done by my dearest friend Joel Steingold @JoelSteingold. I also had the most amazing dancers join the party from @braziliansambaangels. I even banged on the drums with them!

My party would have been nothing without all of my family and friends who celebrated with me. I would like to thank everyone who came and those who helped make my birthday fabulash. I look forward to what the next 50 years of my life has in store for me. 

I also want to say a big thank you to…

Flowers: Joel Steingold @JoelSteingold Videographer: Boima Anderson @Boims_ Photography: Lotta Lemetti @Lottalemetti  Makeup: @terrelmullin Hair: @raym_thefireman Event planner Christine Key for bringing the Donut Wall and planning every detail to perfection.

To view my birthday video and more pics head to my Instagram account!

@dlashes 

LOVE DIONNE
